一般社団法人OnlineMathContestでは「数学を娯楽として楽しむ」を: The General Incorporated Association OnlineMathContest operates under the mission of 'enjoying mathematics as entertainment,' and hosts around 100 completely free and age-unrestricted online math contests per year.
我々の活動を継続するために，当法人ではご寄附のお願いをしております．皆様からいた: To continue our activities, we kindly ask for your support through donations. All contributions will be used to sustain the ongoing organization of our math contests.
暖かいご支援をお待ちしております．: We greatly appreciate your generous support.
